reviews.review_msg: The class was conducted in French, but don't worry, you can complete papers and tests in English, which makes everything feel much more manageable. The lectures were quite interesting, and Sarah graded very fairly. I definitely recommend this class to anyone who speaks French!
Dr. Henzi is a fair marker and very accommodating. There are multiple weekly readings, but most are short.

Lectures hold an overwhelming amount of content and her voice makes you want to fall asleep. But overall she's so caring and knowledgeable in her field, often bringing in guest speakers. The exams are incredibly fair too.

This class was taken in french. Sarah is a very knowledgeable and kind person who is passionate about her students and the content she teaches. She brought wonderful guest speakers almost every week and never put anything on the test that was not in her slides. The downside is she was low energy and I had a hard time staying awake in her lectures.
